{{htmlhead: 
<style type="text/css">
    .form-horizontal .form-group { margin-right: 0; margin-left: 0;}

</style>
}}
{{html:
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-md-12">
            <h2 class="section-title no-margin-top">Send Message</h2>
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-8">
            <section>
                
}}
                {{ contact_form: receiver_email:kristof@greenitglobe.com | custom | subject: Contact Form GreenITGate }}
                {{div3: class=form-group}}
                    {{html: <label for="sender_email">Email</label>}}
                    
                        {{ email: name=sender_email | required | placeholder=Email | class=form-control}}
                    
                {{div3}}
                {{div3: class=form-group}}
                    {{html: <label for="sender_name">Name</label>}}
                    
                        {{ text: name=sender_name | required=true | placeholder=Name | class=form-control}}
                    
                {{div3}}
                {{div3: class=form-group }}
                    {{html: <label for="body">Message</label>}}
                    
                        {{ textarea: rows=10 | cols=20 | required | name=body | class=form-control}}
                    
                {{div3}}

                {{div3: class=form-group}}
                    {{html: <label></label>}}
                    
                        {{ submit: class=btn btn-primary | data-loading-text=Sending... }}
                            {{html: Send}}
                        {{submit}}

                        {{ reset }}
                    
                {{div3}}
                {{ contact_form }}
{{html:
            </section>
        </div>

        <div class="col-md-4">
            <section>
                <div class="panel panel-primary">
                    <div class="panel-heading"><i class="fa fa-envelope-o"></i> Additional Information</div>
                    <div class="panel-body">
                        <h4 class="section-title no-margin-top">Contacts</h4>
                        <address>
                            <strong> Dubai Branch</strong><br>
                            
                            Dubai Internet City
                            United Arab Emirates
                        </address>

                        <!-- Business Hours -->
                        <h4 class="section-title no-margin-top">Contact</h4>
                        For marketing, send your info to marketing@greenitgateway.com

                        (phone inquiries will always be
                        requested to send an e-mail)
                    </div>
                </div>
            </section>
        </div>
    </div>

    <hr class="dotted">

    <section>
        <div class="well well-sm">
            <iframe width="100%" height="350" src="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d3613.2775321919466!2d55.16043499999999!3d25.09246500000002!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x3e5f6b67ed6ad517%3A0xb9e693a60358cadd!2sDubai+Internet+City%2C+Building+5+-+United+Arab+Emirates!5e0!3m2!1sen!2seg!4v1421172993570"></iframe>
        </div>
    </section>
    <script type="text/javascript">
    // need to make contact form work
        $( ".contact_form" ).submit(function( event ) {
            $.get("/restmachine/system/emailsender/send?body=" + encodeURIComponent($('textarea[name=body]').val()) + '&sender_name=' + encodeURIComponent($('input[name=sender_name]').val()) + '&smtp_key=None&format=json&' + '&sender_email=' + encodeURIComponent($('input[name=sender_email]').val()) + '&receiver_email=' + encodeURIComponent($('input[name=receiver_email]').val()) + '&subject=' + encodeURIComponent($('input[name=subject]').val()) , function(data, status){
                if(status == 'success'){
                    $('.contact_form').find('button').parent().find('a').click();
                    $('.contact_form').find('.alert').removeClass('alert-error').addClass('alert-success').text('Sent successfully.').show();
                }else{
                    $('.contact_form').find('button').parent().find('a').click();
                    $('.contact_form').find('.alert').removeClass('alert-success').addClass('alert-error').text(data.result).show();
                }
            });
            event.preventDefault();
        });
    </script>
}}
